h2_title: All Hidden Trophies and Achievements in Black Myth: Wukong
content: **First, you'll need to speak to the NPC in** **Bamboo Grovewho will give you the Gourd. You'll then need to use it to collect a** **Spirit.**
promot:
This is an excerpt from the file 'Achievements_and_Trophies_Guide.md', within the main section titled 'Achievements and Trophies Guide', specifically from the subsection 'All Hidden Trophies and Achievements in Black Myth: Wukong' and the sub-subsection 'Absorb and Cultivate'.
The content is as follows:
**First, you'll need to speak to the NPC in** **Bamboo Grovewho will give you the Gourd. You'll then need to use it to collect a** **Spirit.**
